topic: BSDF file for light redirecting film
body:
Happy New Year Radiance List,


Has anyone had success receiving manufacturer provide BSDF data for light redirecting films (3M/others)?
I see from Basurto’s 2012 workshop presentation there were some xml files from those studies, but does anyone know if these were modelled or measured BSDFs?


Best,


Chris


Chris Coulter
Associate
BuroHappold Engineering | Lighting Design
T: +1 212 334 2025
M: +1 646 574 2791
